description: Welcome to PhotoFun, the premiere photo fun application for your TouchPad.  Just use the buttons to grab a picture from your photo albums, or take a picture with the device's camera.  Select a frame, play with the items (hair styles, mustaches, hats and glasses), you can rotate, zoom and move around the picture and the items. When you save your modified picture, appear in the photofun album!   (There are some experimental face in hole frames as well).    GET IT NOW!! When I enable the free downloadable content, it will increase its price :D
versionNote: Fixed to work on 3.0.4. This is NOT the big update, just to make the camera portion to work properly.
